channel.title: Three problems
channel.description:
1. My first problem is whenever i start up my server sometimes only 1 person can log on and so on it tells everyone else error connecting to server. Please help. Thanks.
2.My second problem is every so often my players get this error with there silabsoft client could anyone tell me whats wrong?. Thanks.
[code] [Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9589 at client.f(client.java) at client.a(client.java) at client.bb(client.java) at client.G(client.java) at client.c(client.java) at a.run(a.java) at client.run(client.java) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
3.My last problem is whenever im running the server my .bat shows this could anyone explain to me whats wrong. Thanks.
[code] Connection accepted from **.***.***.**: 50229. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:9037) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:170) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Three problems
item.dc:creator: @chesslemac chesslemac
item.description:
@chesslemac wrote:

Sorry, but could explain how to make a run method. :o
